sense.def:
To push something
pomeni nekaj na silo pahniti, pogosto zato, da bi tisto premaknili.

seg.quote: She pushed the button that locked the door.
I pushed open the door.
Castle pushed his bicycle up King's Road.
The gate slid open at the push of a button.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with or without
OBJ,
with
ADJUNCT

sense.def:
To push through things
ali
to push one's way through things
pomeni uporabiti silo, da gremo lahko mimo stvari, ki nas ovirajo.

seg.quote: Ralph pushed between them to get a better view.
I pushed my way through the people.

sense.def:
To push a value or amount up or down
pomeni povzročiti, da se vrednost ali količina nečesa poveča ali zmanjša.

seg.quote: The oil boom will push the inflation rate up to higher levels.

sense.def:
To push someone into doing something
pomeni prepričati ali prisiliti nekoga, da nekaj naredi;

seg.quote: No one pushed me into this; I decided to do it of my own accord.
The government was pushed to desperate extremes.

sense.def:
To push for something
pomeni zelo si prizadevati, da bi nekaj dosegli.

seg.quote: He is pushing for secret balloting in Party elections.
India led the non-aligned nations in a push for sanctions.

sense.def:
To push something
pomeni tudi prizadevati si, da bi povečali priljubljenost nečesa ali pritegnili ljudi k nečemu;

seg.quote: ...huge adverts pushing slimming drugs.

sense.def:
To push drugs
pomeni nezakonito prodajati mamila;

seg.quote: ...professional dope pushers.

sense.def:
To give someone the push
pomeni reči nekomu, da ga ne želimo več;

seg.quote: Another forty workers have been given the push.

sense.def:
To push ahead with something
pomeni nekaj delati naprej.

seg.quote: They have pushed ahead with an optimistic development strategy.

sense.def:
To push someone around
pomeni nekomu ukazovati na grob in žaljiv način.

seg.quote: We're not going to let them push us around.

sense.def:
To push in
pomeni postaviti se v vrsto čakajočih pred druge;

seg.quote: Felicity pushed in next to Howard.
Push off. You're not wanted.

sense.def:
To push on
pomeni potovati naprej proti cilju ali delati nekaj naprej.

To push someone or something over
pomeni potisniti osebo ali stvar, tako da pade.

seg.quote: The children were pushing each other over on the sand.

sense.def:
To push through a proposal
pomeni kljub težavam uspeti v prizadevanjih, da bi bil neki predlog sprejet.

seg.quote: I'll see that the scheme is pushed through at the earliest date.
